Question.Subject: I need an idea for an email?
Question.Content:
Hi there. I'm making an email, and I need some ideas on what to make it as. My favorite color is blue. I ride horses (barrel racing, showing -- western). I'm a girl.....
I was thinking some to do with barrel racing. Thanks for your help.. ♫its a filthy hot mess;;♫
